      display: flex;

      justify-content: space-between;
      align-items: center;

      border-right: 1px solid lightgray;
      width: 100%;
      background-color: white;

      background-color: pink;

      height: 44px;
      overflow: hidden;

    }

      border-top: 1px solid lightgray;
    }
